name: Chapter 06 - The Arcade 🎮
description:
Chapter 6

The Arcade 🎮

Penelope and Milo have arrived at the newly opened Arcade, where some of their friends are already waiting for them. It doesn't take that long for them to realise that Sally, Toby and Fips have claimed the Pinball for themselves. The three friends are so immersed playing Pinball that they didn't notice when the two lovebirds waved at them. Sally is really good and keeps beating her own high score a few times! "Now it's my turn", Fips replies, annoyed.
